summary: A Unite.vim plugin to search/install RubyGems packages easily, using gem command
name: unite-gem
description:
A Unite.vim plugin to search/install RubyGems packages easily, using gem command.
See details in the following pages.

* http://github.com/ujihisa/unite-gem (development)

Dependency: gem command
install_details: After you install Shougo's unite.vim, unarchive the zip file into a directory that is under &rtp of your Vim, including ~/.vim dir.
